Author: annielovesbacon
Text: I saw this post after the one about you going to the ER and just wanted to send some love. I’m not sure if your perspective in this post has changed since then but hopefully having to go to the ER can be used in arguments against the ED voice if that makes sense... I know how hard it is to convince yourself that you really are sick and trying to get better won’t erase that. I find it helps me to argue with objective facts (like this is affecting my health because X happened, I’m hurting my friends because so-and-so said Y, etc)  PS I’m proud of you for going to rehab for your addiction <3
